alert.note: Alert for Edgefield; McCormick (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 12 at 5:28PM EST until January 12 at 5:45PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EST FOR NORTHWESTERN EDGEFIELD AND EAST CENTRAL MCCORMICK COUNTIES... At 527 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Hamilton Branch State Park, or 16 miles north of Martinez, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Edgefield around 550 PM EST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Cleora, Parksville and Modoc. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to an interior room or closet on the lowest floor of a sturdy building immediately.
